(Hate to remind you that the autoguns would be confused by the mirror 
chips and not know where Foxfingers is.)

One by one the mirror chips were blasted. a few shots later they were 
destroyed. Foxfingers plan had worked, unfortunately he was out of 
chips. He held still as he could hoping the autoguns would think he 
was destroyed. He knew Darkmouse knew he was alive so it wouldn't be 
long till she corrected them. He had two options, either escape or 
find a place on the ship that didn't have autoguns. If he left the 
outside guns would reduce him to slag. He scanned the ship and found 
an area of the ship without guns. He stayed close to the wall 
sneaking under a few cameras. He slowly worked his way to the safe 
spot. (The science lab.)


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> DarkMouse:;
> 
> She ran after him. "AUTOGUN, FIRE ON THE INTRUDER!"
> 
> The autoguns opened fire on FoxFingers
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Foxfingers took off in a mad dash rounding the corner with 
foxlike 
> agility.
> > either he'd startled the bot after him or she was a really bad 
> shot. (Like
> > most villains)
> > 
> > He came to a hault around another corner just now noticing that 
> this time he
> > was armed and could strike back. He drew his pistol and readied 
> himself.
> > It'd been a while since he'd used a weapon, he wasn't sure if he 
> still
> > could. he just knew that he'd been caught before trying to raid 
> Pred camps.
> > He was in no hurry to get caught again.
